Description: Date and time when the QoS measurement was recorded
Mobile Network Operator providing the service (e.g., MTN, Airtel)
Administrative district in Rwanda where the measurement was taken
Unique identifier of the cellular base station (cell tower)
Mobile network technology used (e.g., 2G, 3G, 4G LTE, 5G)
Type of network site (e.g., urban, suburban, rural)
Average data download speed experienced by users
Average data upload speed experienced by users
Time delay between sending and receiving data packets
Variation in packet delay over time
Percentage of data packets lost during transmission
Reference Signal Received Power, indicating signal strength
Reference Signal Received Quality, indicating signal quality
Percentage of network resource utilization at the cell
Number of users actively connected to the cell
Percentage of successful call setup attempts
Percentage of calls dropped during communication
Mean Opinion Score representing voice call quality
User-perceived quality of experience rating
Volume of data consumed by users during the session
Overall customer satisfaction classification (Good, Neutral, Poor)
